channel.title: Aggressive Action on Fen TTRPG
channel.description: Recent content in Aggressive Action on Fen TTRPG

item.title: Attack
item.description: You make one melee or ranged attack. See Attacking and Defending.
item.content: You make one melee or ranged attack. See Attacking and Defending.

item.title: Load
item.description:
1 aggressive action

You load ammunition into a weapon with the Loaded weapon trait. The number of ammunition loaded into the weapon is specified by its Loaded trait.
item.content:
1 aggressive action

You load ammunition into a weapon with the Loaded weapon trait. The number of ammunition loaded into the weapon is specified by its Loaded trait.

item.title: Use Unequipped Item
item.description: Use or interact with an item that is marked in one of the stored slots.
item.content: Use or interact with an item that is marked in one of the stored slots.
